question: The National Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC) has set up electric vehicles at these two cities.
explanation: The National Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC) has set up electric vehicles at Delhi and Noida, and will soon expand this to other location across the NCR region.
